freedomsvc: <input type="hidden" id="rssid" value="[rssid]"/> <input autocomplete="off" class="frss_input" id="rss" type="text" name="rss" style="width:60%" onkeypress="return rssGetReturn(event)" onkeyup="rssRunSearch(event);" value="[rss]">  <input type="checkbox" class="frss_input" name="sysrss" id="sysrss" [sysrssst] title="[TEXT:rss: select to search in system RSS (else mine only)]">
